TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ServiceBehaviorAttribute extends System.Attribute implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior
Public NotInheritable Class ServiceBehaviorAttribute Inherits Attribute Implements IServiceBehavior
public ref class ServiceBehaviorAttribute sealed : Attribute, System::ServiceModel::Description::IServiceBehavior
type ServiceBehaviorAttribute = class inherit Attribute interface IServiceBehavior

Attribute.AttributeName: System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Class)

summary.span: 指定服務合約實作的內部執行行為。

span.span: Specifies the internal execution behavior of a service contract implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將 屬性套用至服務實作，即可指定整個服務的執行行為。Apply the attribute to a service implementation to specify service-wide execution behavior. (如果要指定方法層級的執行行為，請使用 屬性)。這個屬性只能套用至服務實作。(To specify execution behavior at the method level, use the attribute.) This attribute can be applied only to service implementations. 如需實用範例，請參閱[服務：行為範例](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms751453(v=vs.90))。For working examples, see the [Service: Behaviors Samples](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms751453(v=vs.90)). 屬性是 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 程式設計模型功能，可讓開發人員必須另外實作的常見功能。 properties are a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) programming model feature that enables common features that developers otherwise have to implement. 如需有關這些和其他行為的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 指定服務執行階段行為](~/docs/framework/wcf/specifying-service-run-time-behavior.md)。For more information about these and other behaviors, see [Specifying Service Run-Time Behavior](~/docs/framework/wcf/specifying-service-run-time-behavior.md). 如需有關基礎執行階段屬性的下列屬性設定中，該部分請參閱[擴充 ServiceHost 與服務模型層](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/extending-servicehost-and-the-service-model-layer.md)。For more information about the underlying runtime properties that some of the following properties set, see [Extending ServiceHost and the Service Model Layer](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/extending-servicehost-and-the-service-model-layer.md). - 屬性會指定發送器系統用來找出負責處理要求之端點的篩選條件類型。The property specifies the type of filter that the dispatcher system uses to locate the endpoint that handles requests. - 當通道關閉，而且服務已完成處理任何剩餘的訊息時， 屬性便會自動關閉工作階段。The property automatically closes the session when the channel is closed and the service has finished processing any remaining messages. - 屬性會控制內部執行緒模型，以便支援可重新進入 (Reentrant) 或多執行緒服務的物件。The property controls the internal threading model, enabling support for reentrant or multithreaded services. - 屬性 (Property) 是用來宣告在組態檔中 `name` 項目之 `` 屬性 (Attribute) 中所使用的名稱。The property is used to declare a name for use in the `name` attribute of the `` element in a configuration file. - 屬性會讓執行階段略過不是處理訊息時所需要的額外序列化資訊。The property enables the run time to ignore extra serialization information that is not required to process the message. - 屬性會指定服務中未處理的例外狀況是否會當做 SOAP 錯誤傳回。The property specifies whether unhandled exceptions in a service are returned as SOAP faults. 這種設定僅供偵錯用途。This is for debugging purposes only. - 屬性會指定是否要在與用戶端交換期間回收服務和其服務物件，以及在何時回收。The property specifies whether and when services and their service objects are to be recycled during an exchange with a client. - 屬性會限制物件圖形中已序列化項目的數目。The property to limit on the number of items in an object graph that are serialized. - 和 屬性會控制服務項目之 WSDL 運算式的名稱和命名空間。The and properties control the name and namespace for the WSDL expression of the service element. - 屬性會指定是否會在異動完成時回收服務物件。The property specifies whether the service object is recycled when a transaction completes. - 屬性會指定是否要在工作階段關閉時完成未完成的異動。The property specifies whether outstanding transactions are completed when the session closes. - 屬性會指定合約支援的交易隔離等級。The property specifies the transaction isolation level that the contract supports. - 屬性會指定異動必須在該段期間完成、否則就會中止的時間間隔。The property specifies the time period within which a transaction must complete or it aborts. - 屬性會指出是否要搭配使用者介面執行緒，自動同步處理傳入的方法呼叫。The property indicates whether to synchronize inbound method calls with the user interface thread automatically. - 屬性會通知系統是否要確認已實際瞭解標示為 `MustUnderstand` 的 SOAP 標頭。The property informs the system whether it should confirm that SOAP headers marked as `MustUnderstand` have, in fact, been understood. 屬性也可以使用應用程式組態檔來設定。The property can also be set using an application configuration file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 。For details, see . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範 屬性。The following code example demonstrates the properties. `BehaviorService` 類別會使用 屬性指出：The `BehaviorService` class uses the attribute to indicate that: - 此服務物件會在交易完成時回收。The service object is recycled when the transaction completes. - 每個工作階段都有一個服務物件。There is one service object for each session. - 該服務為單一執行緒服務，而且不支援可重新進入的呼叫。The service is single-threaded and does not support reentrant calls. 此外，位於作業層級的 值表示 `TxWork` 方法會自動登記在流動交易中或建立新交易來執行工作，並且表示如果沒有發生未處理的例外狀況，則會自動認可這項交易。Furthermore, at the operation level, the values indicate that the `TxWork` method automatically enlists in flowed transactions or creates a new transaction to do the work, and that the transaction is committed automatically if an unhandled exception does not occur. [!code-csharp[OperationBehaviorAttribute1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationbehaviorattribute1/cs/services.cs#2)] [!code-vb[OperationBehaviorAttribute1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationbehaviorattribute1/vb/services.vb#2)] 基礎繫結必須支援流動交易，才能讓下列程式碼範例正確執行。The underlying binding must support flowed transactions for the following code example to execute properly. 例如，若要使用 支援流動的交易，請透過程式碼或應用程式組態檔，將 屬性設定為 `true`。To support flowed transactions using the , for example, set the property to `true` in code or in an application configuration file. 下列程式碼範例會顯示先前範例的組態檔。The following code example shows the configuration file for the preceding sample. [!code-xml[OperationBehaviorAttribute1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationbehaviorattribute1/cs/hostapplication.exe.config#1)]

summary.span: 指定是否要在用戶端關閉輸出工作階段時，自動關閉工作階段。

span.span: Specifies whether to automatically close a session when a client closes an output session.

value.span: 如果服務會在用戶端關閉輸出工作階段時自動關閉工作階段，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if services automatically close a session when the client closes an output session; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，當用戶端關閉輸出工作階段，且服務已完成處理任何剩餘的訊息時，伺服器便會關閉工作階段。By default when a client closes an output session and the service has finished processing any remaining messages the server closes the session. 將 設定為 `false`，以防止伺服器自動關閉工作階段，並啟用工作階段存留期的自訂控制。Setting to `false` prevents the server from automatically closing the session and enables custom control of session lifetimes.

summary.span: 取得或設定服務是支援單一執行緒、多重執行緒或可重新進入的呼叫。

span.span: Gets or sets whether a service supports one thread, multiple threads, or reentrant calls.

value.span: 其中一個 值，預設值為 。

span.span: One of the values; the default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會指出服務的執行個體是可以處理單一執行緒或同時執行的多重執行緒，以及在遇到單一執行緒時，是否會支援重新進入。This property indicates whether an instance of a service can handle one thread or multiple threads that execute concurrently, and if single-threaded, whether reentrancy is supported. > [!NOTE] > 屬性會與其他設定互動。The property interacts with some other settings. 例如，如果 值是設定為 ，這時除非您也將 值設定為 ，否則您的服務一次只能處理一個訊息。For example, if the value is set to the result is that your service can only process one message at a time unless you also set the value to . 這個屬性也會產生與 屬性一起使用的行為。This property also produces behavior in combination with the property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 工作階段，Instancing，and Concurrency](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/sessions-instancing-and-concurrency.md)。For details, see [Sessions, Instancing, and Concurrency](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/sessions-instancing-and-concurrency.md). 將 設定為 ，便會指示系統要將服務的執行個體限制為一次執行一個執行緒，這樣您就不需要處理執行緒問題。Setting to instructs the system to restrict instances of the service to one thread of execution at a time, which frees you from dealing with threading issues. 值為 時，表示服務物件可在任何時間由多個執行緒執行。A value of means that service objects can be executed by multiple threads at any one time. 在這種情況下，您必須確保執行緒安全。In this case, you must ensure thread safety. 也會限制存取單一執行緒一次;當作業正在處理，沒有其他訊息進入作業。 also restricts access to a single thread at a time; while the operation is processing, no other message can enter the operation. 如果有另一個服務呼叫在作業期間離開，這個目前訊息便會失去作業鎖定，並使得該作業可任意處理其他訊息。If during the operation a call to another service leaves, the current message loses the lock on the operation, which is free to process other messages. 當服務呼叫傳回時，鎖定便會重新建立，而原始訊息可以繼續處理其總結，或是繼續處理直到發生作業的另一個呼叫為止。When the service call out returns, the lock is reestablished and the original message can continue processing to its conclusion or until another call out of the operation occurs. > [!IMPORTANT] > 即使執行個體限制為一次執行一個執行緒的服務，您也必須設定為 1，以確保沒有順序的訊息。Even though restricts instances of the service to one thread of execution at a time, you must also set to 1 to guarantee no out-of-order messages. > > 此外，您必須負責以保持物件狀態在對外呼叫之前一致，而且您必須確認對外呼叫之後，作業本機資料有效。Also, it is your responsibility to leave your object state consistent before callouts and you must confirm that operation-local data is valid after callouts. 請注意，只有透過 WCF 通道呼叫另一個服務才能解除服務執行個體鎖定。Note that the service instance is unlocked only by calling another service over a WCF channel. 此時，被呼叫的服務可透過回呼重新進入第一個服務。In this case, the called service can reenter the first service via a callback. 如果第一個服務無法重新進入，這時的呼叫順序會造成死結。If the first service is not reentrant, the sequence of calls results in a deadlock. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 。For details, see . 在處理作業處理任何傳出呼叫期間，非作業的本機資料可以進行修改 During any outbound call from a processing operation, data not local to the operation can be modified. (本機狀態資料保證在原始訊息繼續處理時仍屬有效)。因此，在傳出呼叫之前，您必須確保非本機資料對其他傳入呼叫是有效的，而且會在傳出呼叫傳回時，重新驗證非本機資料。(Local state data is guaranteed to be valid when the original message resumes processing.) As a result, before your outbound call you must ensure that non-local data is valid for other incoming calls and revalidate non-local data after the outbound call returns. 下列虛擬程式碼將示範順利重新進入支援的必要模式。The following pseudo-code illustrates the required pattern for successful reentrant support. ```csharp public void MyMethod() { this.SomeNonLocalDataState; // Here you need to clean nonlocal state for other users OutboundProxy proxy = new OutboundProxy(); int returnValue = proxy.CallOutOfOperation(); // Ensure that this.SomeNonLocalDataState is valid for continued use. this.ModifyNonLocalState; return returnValue; } ``` 當 為 時，對傳出呼叫使用 Begin/End 非同步呼叫模式會觸發例外狀況。Using the Begin/End asynchronous call pattern for an outbound call when the is triggers an exception. 非同步傳出呼叫需要 為 的作業，而在該情況下，您必須處理同步處理問題。Asynchronous outbound calls require an operation in which is , in which case you must handle synchronization issues. 一般來說，如果違反其並行模式的執行個體有訊息到達，該訊息會等到執行個體可供使用為止，或等到它逾時為止。Generally, if a message arrives for an instance that violates its concurrency mode, the message waits until the instance is available, or until it times out. 此外，如果 設定為 ，且可重新進入的呼叫在等待釋放執行個體時遭到封鎖，系統就會偵測到此死結並擲回例外狀況。In addition, if the is set to and a reentrant call is blocked while waiting for the instance to be freed, the system detects the deadlock and throws an exception. > [!NOTE] > 當 屬性設定為 時，如果 `true` 是 ，便會在執行階段擲回 。A is thrown at runtime if is `true` when the property is set to . 請注意，如果有作業的 設定為 true，且您將 `false` 設定為 ，則您必須將 明確設定為 。Note that you must explicitly set to `false` if there is an operation with set to true and you set to . 否則，便會擲回驗證例外狀況，因為 的預設值為 `true`。Otherwise a validation exception is thrown because the default value of is `true`. 和其他屬性之間的互動可以改變執行階段行為。There is an interaction of the and other properties that can alter runtime behavior. 這些互動的完整說明，請參閱[工作階段，Instancing，and Concurrency](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/sessions-instancing-and-concurrency.md)。For a complete description of these interactions, see [Sessions, Instancing, and Concurrency](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/sessions-instancing-and-concurrency.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範使用 、 和 之間的差異。The following code example demonstrates the different between using , , and . 此範例不會編譯而不需要實際的實作，其項目，後面，但並未示範執行緒保證，可讓 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF)，這表示您的作業程式碼的類型。This sample does not compile without a real implementation behind it, but does demonstrate the kind of threading guarantees that Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) makes and what that means for your operation code. [!code-csharp[C_BestPractices-Concurrency#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_bestpractices-concurrency/cs/reentrantandmultiple.cs#1)]

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果型別實作介面，它會儲存它並不知道任何來自網路時還原序列化為該類型的額外資料。If a type implements the interface, it stores any extra data it doesn't know about that comes over the wire when deserializing into that type. 例如，如果型別 `Person` 具有成員 `FirstName` 和 `LastName`，這時若有個 `PhoneNumber` 的項目進入，該項目便會被儲存起來。For example, if a type `Person` has members `FirstName` and `LastName`, and an element called `PhoneNumber` comes in, it is stored. 當稍後序列化此型別時，`PhoneNumber` 將會重新發出。When later serializing the type, `PhoneNumber` will be re-emitted. 問題是，結構描述`Person`匯出的服務只能有`FirstName`和`LastName`，因此 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 會產生結構描述無效的執行個體 ！The problem is that the schema for `Person` exported by that service only has `FirstName` and `LastName`, so Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) generates a schema-invalid instance! 如果嚴格的結構描述相容性很重要，您可以將 設定為 `true`，以便關閉這個重新發出的行為。If strict schema compliance is important, you can set to `true` to turn this re-emitting behavior off. 無論設定，WCF 永遠會處理已知的資料 （傳入及傳出） 而且在額外資料進入時，不會擲回例外狀況。Regardless setting, WCF always processes known data (both in and out) and does not throw exceptions when extra data comes in. 您也可以設定此屬性使用[ <dataContractSerializer> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/datacontractserializer-element.md)應用程式組態檔中的項目。You can also set this property using the [<dataContractSerializer>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/datacontractserializer-element.md) element in an application configuration file. ## Examples 下列範例會示範 的使用和 的實作。The following example shows the use of and an implementation of . 在這個範例中，藉由將 設定為 `false`，用戶端便會將所知道的額外資料再傳回用戶端。In this sample, with set to `false`, the extra data that the client knows about is round-tripped back to the client. [!code-csharp[DCAContainerNoValidation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/dcacontainernovalidation/cs/services.cs#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指定一般未處理的執行例外狀況 (要轉換為型別 的 )，並傳送為錯誤訊息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies that general unhandled execution exceptions are to be converted into a of type and sent as a fault message.

summary.span: 請只在開發期間將這個項目設定為 ，以針對服務進行疑難排解。

span.span: Set this to only during development to troubleshoot a service.

value.span: 如果未處理的例外狀況要當做 SOAP 錯誤傳回，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if unhandled exceptions are to be returned as SOAP faults; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將 設定為 `true`，即可讓例外狀況資訊流至用戶端，以供偵錯之用。Set to `true` to enable exception information to flow to clients for debugging purposes. 這個屬性需要支援要求-回應或雙工訊息的繫結。This property requires a binding that supports either request-response or duplex messaging. 在所有 Managed 應用程式中，處理錯誤由 物件表示。In all managed applications, processing errors are represented by objects. 在 WCF 應用程式等 SOAP 型的應用程式，實作服務作業的方法進行通訊使用 SOAP 錯誤訊息的錯誤資訊。In SOAP-based applications such as WCF applications, methods that implement service operations communicate error information using SOAP fault messages. 因為 WCF 應用程式執行這兩種錯誤系統下，需要傳送給用戶端的任何 managed 例外狀況資訊必須轉換成 SOAP 錯誤的例外狀況。Because WCF applications execute under both types of error systems, any managed exception information that needs to be sent to the client must be converted from exceptions into SOAP faults. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 指定及處理合約和服務中的錯誤](~/docs/framework/wcf/specifying-and-handling-faults-in-contracts-and-services.md)。For more information, see [Specifying and Handling Faults in Contracts and Services](~/docs/framework/wcf/specifying-and-handling-faults-in-contracts-and-services.md). 在開發期間，您可能會希望您的服務同時將其他例外狀況傳回用戶端，以進行偵錯。During development, you may want your service to also send other exceptions back to the client to assist you in debugging. 這是開發階段專用的功能，因此不可以用在已部署的服務中。This is a development-only feature and should not be employed in deployed services. 若要協助偵錯開發，將至`true`程式碼，或使用應用程式組態檔。To facilitate debugging development, set the to `true` either in code or using an application configuration file. 啟用時，服務會自動將較安全的例外狀況資訊傳回給呼叫者。When enabled, the service automatically returns safer exception information to the caller. 這些錯誤會以型別 的 物件呈現給用戶端。These faults appear to the client as objects of type . > [!IMPORTANT] > 設定至`true`可讓用戶端取得有關內部服務方法例外狀況，則只建議這種暫時偵錯服務應用程式。Setting to `true` enables clients to obtain information about internal service method exceptions; it is only recommended as a way of temporarily debugging a service application. 此外，若某個方法以這種方式傳回未處理的 Managed 例外狀況，則該方法的 WSDL 不會包含 型別之 的合約。In addition, the WSDL for a method that returns unhandled managed exceptions in this way does not contain the contract for the of type . 用戶端必須預期未知 SOAP 錯誤的可能性，才能正確取得偵錯資訊。Clients must expect the possibility of an unknown SOAP fault to obtain the debugging information properly. 將此屬性設定為`true`也可以使用應用程式組態檔和[ <serviceDebug> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicedebug.md)項目，如下列程式碼範例所示。Setting this property to `true` can also be done using an application configuration file and the [<serviceDebug>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicedebug.md) element, as the following code example shows. [!code-xml[OperationBehaviorAttribute1#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationbehaviorattribute1/cs/hostapplication.exe.config#10)] ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範 屬性。The following code example demonstrates the properties. `BehaviorService` 類別會使用 屬性指出：The `BehaviorService` class uses the attribute to indicate that: - 實作方法會在 UI 執行緒上叫用。Implementation methods are invoked on the UI thread. - 每個工作階段都有一個服務物件。There is one service object for each session. - 該服務為單一執行緒服務，而且不支援可重新進入的呼叫。The service is single-threaded and does not support reentrant calls. 此外，位於作業層級的 值表示 `TxWork` 方法會自動登記在流動交易中或建立新交易來執行工作，並且表示如果沒有發生未處理的例外狀況，則會自動認可這項交易。Furthermore, at the operation level, the values indicate that the `TxWork` method automatically enlists in flowed transactions or creates a new transaction to do the work, and that the transaction is committed automatically if an unhandled exception does not occur. [!code-csharp[OperationBehaviorAttribute1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationbehaviorattribute1/cs/services.cs#2)] [!code-vb[OperationBehaviorAttribute1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationbehaviorattribute1/vb/services.vb#2)] 基礎繫結必須支援流動交易，才能讓下列程式碼範例正確執行。The underlying binding must support flowed transactions for the following code example to execute properly. 例如，若要使用 支援流動的交易，請透過程式碼或應用程式組態檔，將 屬性設定為 `true`。To support flowed transactions using the , for example, set the property to `true` in code or in an application configuration file. 下列程式碼範例會顯示先前範例的組態檔。The following code example shows the configuration file for the preceding sample. [!code-xml[OperationBehaviorAttribute1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationbehaviorattribute1/cs/hostapplication.exe.config#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指出何時建立新的服務物件。

span.span: Gets or sets the value that indicates when new service objects are created.

value.span: 其中一個 值；預設值為 。

span.span: One of the values; the default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 屬性，即可指定建立新服務物件的時機。Use the property to specify when new service objects are created. 由於服務物件不是直接連接至通訊通道，因此服務物件的存留期與用戶端和服務應用程式之間的通道的存留期無關。Because the service object is not directly connected to the communicating channel, the lifetime of the service objects is independent of the lifetime of the channel between a client and the service application. 預設值 ，會在用戶端和服務應用程式之間建立新通訊工作階段時，指示服務應用程式建立新的服務物件。The default value, , instructs the service application to create a new service object when a new communication session is established between a client and the service application. 在相同工作階段中的後續呼叫會由相同物件處理。Subsequent calls in the same session are handled by the same object. 表示每個服務物件都會處理來自一個用戶端通道的要求。 indicates that each service object handles requests from one client channel. > [!NOTE] > 屬性會與其他設定互動。The property interacts with some other settings. 例如，如果 值是設定為 ，這時除非您也將 值設定為 ，否則您的服務一次只能處理一個訊息。For example, if the value is set to the result is that your service can only process one message at a time unless you also set the value to . 這個屬性也會產生與 屬性一起使用的行為。This property also produces behavior in combination with the property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 工作階段，Instancing，and Concurrency](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/sessions-instancing-and-concurrency.md)。For details, see [Sessions, Instancing, and Concurrency](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/sessions-instancing-and-concurrency.md). 對於單一存留期行為 (例如，如果主應用程式呼叫 建構函式，並傳遞物件做為服務使用)，服務類別必須將 設定為 `Single`，否則會在執行階段擲回例外狀況。For singleton lifetime behavior (for example, if the host application calls the constructor and passes an object to use as the service), the service class must set to `Single`, or an exception is thrown at run time. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範 屬性。The following code example demonstrates the properties. `BehaviorService` 類別會使用 屬性指出：The `BehaviorService` class uses the attribute to indicate that: - 實作方法會在 UI 執行緒上叫用。Implementation methods are invoked on the UI thread. - 每個工作階段都有一個服務物件。There is one service object for each session. - 該服務為單一執行緒服務，而且不支援可重新進入的呼叫。The service is single-threaded and does not support reentrant calls. 此外，位於作業層級的 值表示 `TxWork` 方法會自動登記在流動交易中或建立新交易來執行工作，並且表示如果沒有發生未處理的例外狀況，則會自動認可這項交易。Furthermore, at the operation level, the values indicate that the `TxWork` method automatically enlists in flowed transactions or creates a new transaction to do the work, and that the transaction is committed automatically if an unhandled exception does not occur. [!code-csharp[OperationBehaviorAttribute1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationbehaviorattribute1/cs/services.cs#2)] [!code-vb[OperationBehaviorAttribute1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationbehaviorattribute1/vb/services.vb#2)] 基礎繫結必須支援流動交易，才能讓下列程式碼範例正確執行。The underlying binding must support flowed transactions for the following code example to execute properly. 例如，若要使用 支援流動的交易，請透過程式碼或應用程式組態檔，將 屬性設定為 `true`。To support flowed transactions using the , for example, set the property to `true` in code or in an application configuration file. 下列程式碼範例會顯示先前範例的組態檔。The following code example shows the configuration file for the preceding sample. [!code-xml[OperationBehaviorAttribute1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationbehaviorattribute1/cs/hostapplication.exe.config#1)]

value.span: 預設為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請注意，如果有作業的 設定為 true，且您將 `false` 設定為 ，則您必須將 明確設定為 。Note that you must explicitly set to `false` if there is an operation with set to true and you set to . 否則，便會擲回驗證例外狀況，因為 的預設值為 `true`。Otherwise a validation exception is thrown because the default value of is `true`. 此外，您務必要瞭解，如果服務是藉由將服務物件傳遞至 建構函式所建立，這個屬性的值就會以它是 `false` 的方式進行處理。In addition, it is important to realize that if the service is created by passing a service object to the constructor, the value of this property is treated as if it were `false`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將交易隔離等級設定為 、停用並行交易的支援、需要來自作業呼叫的流動交易，並且會自動認可服務上的交易 (若無未處理的例外狀況發生)。The following code example sets the transaction isolation level to , disables support for concurrent transactions, requires a flowed transaction from the operation call, and commits the transaction on the service automatically if no unhandled exception occurs. [!code-csharp[SBA.Transactions#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/sba.transactions/cs/services.cs#2)] [!code-vb[SBA.Transactions#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/sba.transactions/vb/services.vb#2)] 基礎繫結必須支援流動交易，才能讓下列程式碼範例正確執行。The underlying binding must support flowed transactions for the following code example to execute properly. 例如，若要使用 支援流動的交易，請透過程式碼或應用程式組態檔，將 屬性設定為 `true`。To support flowed transactions using the , for example, set the property to `true` in code or in an application configuration file. 下列程式碼範例會顯示先前範例的組態檔。The following code example shows a configuration file for the preceding sample. [!code-xml[SBA.Transactions#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/sba.transactions/cs/hostapplication.exe.config#1)]

summary.span: 將自訂資料物件傳遞至支援此行為屬性的繫結。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Transactions::IsolationLevel TransactionIsolationLevel { System::Transactions::IsolationLevel get(); void set(System::Transactions::IsolationLevel value); };
member this.TransactionIsolationLevel : System.Transactions.IsolationLevel with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 指定在服務內建立之新異動、以及來自用戶端之傳入異動的異動隔離等級。

span.span: Specifies the transaction isolation level for new transactions created inside the service, and incoming transactions flowed from a client.

value.span: 指定異動隔離等級的 值。

span.span: A value that specifies the transaction isolation level.

value.span: 預設為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 異動所執行的隔離等級會決定其他異動變更時如何處理資料，並且決定異動必須保持鎖定的時間長度，以免受到這些變更影響。The isolation level in which your transaction runs determines how data is treated when changes are made in other transactions and how long your transaction must hold locks to protect against these changes. 例如，預設值 會指定在交易完成之前，不會發生任何更新或插入。For example, the default value, , specifies that no updating or inserting can occur until the transaction is complete. 這個屬性也可以用於限制來自用戶端之傳入交易的隔離等級。This property can also be used to restrict the isolation level of incoming transactions flowed from a client. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將交易隔離等級設定為 ，且此範例不支援同時交易、需要來自方法呼叫的流動交易，並且會在沒有發生未處理的例外狀況自動認可該交易。The following code example sets the transaction isolation level to , does not support concurrent transactions, requires a flowed transaction from the method call, and commits the transaction automatically if no unhandled exception occurs. [!code-csharp[SBA.Transactions#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/sba.transactions/cs/services.cs#2)] [!code-vb[SBA.Transactions#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/sba.transactions/vb/services.vb#2)] 基礎繫結必須支援流動交易，才能讓下列程式碼範例正確執行。The underlying binding must support flowed transactions for the following code example to execute properly. 例如，若要使用 支援流動的交易，請透過程式碼或應用程式組態檔，將 屬性設定為 `true`。To support flowed transactions using the , for example, set the property to `true` in code or in an application configuration file. 下列程式碼範例會顯示先前範例的組態檔。The following code example shows a configuration file for the preceding sample. [!code-xml[SBA.Transactions#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/sba.transactions/cs/hostapplication.exe.config#1)]

exception.span: 該值不是其中一個 值。

span.span: The value is not one of the values.

summary.span: 取得或設定交易必須完成的期間。

span.span: Gets or sets the period within which a transaction must complete.

value.span: 物件，代表異動必須在期間完成、否則會自動中止的時間。

span.span: A object that represents the time within which transactions must complete or be automatically aborted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個值會設定 屬性。This value sets the property. 您也可以設定此屬性使用[ <serviceTimeouts> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicetimeouts.md)應用程式組態檔中的項目。You can also set this property using the [<serviceTimeouts>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicetimeouts.md) element in an application configuration file. ## Examples 下列組態檔會指定三分鐘的異動逾時期間。The following configuration file specifies a transaction timeout period of three minutes. [!code-csharp[SBA.TransactionTimeout#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/sba.transactiontimeout/cs/services.cs#2)] [!code-vb[SBA.TransactionTimeout#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/sba.transactiontimeout/vb/services.vb#2)]

span.span: The value is null.

exception.span: 這個值小於 或大於 。

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定是否使用目前的同步處理內容來選擇執行的執行緒。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to use the current synchronization context to choose the thread of execution.

value.span: 如果所有對服務的呼叫都必須在 指定的執行緒上執行，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if all calls to the service must run on the thread specified by the ; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性，即可提供部分應用程式所需要的使用者介面執行緒相似性。Use this property to provide the user interface thread affinity that some applications require. 例如，Windows Forms 應用程式可能會註冊為單一服務物件。For example, a Windows Forms application may be registered as a singleton service object. 在這種情況中，所有對服務的呼叫都必須在 Windows Forms 執行緒上執行。In this case, all calls into the service must run on the Windows Forms thread. 在預設的情況中， 是設定為 `true`，並將對服務的所有呼叫同步處理成都在 所擷取的執行緒上執行。The default case, in which is set to `true`, synchronizes all calls to the service to run on the thread captured from the .

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.DefaultValue(true)
get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定系統或應用程式是否會強制執行 SOAP 標頭處理。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the system or the application enforces SOAP header processing.

value.span: 如果系統要執行 SOAP 標頭 處理，則為 ，否則為 ，表示應用程式會執行這項處理。

span.span: if the system is to perform SOAP header processing; otherwise , which indicates that the application performs this processing.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 屬性，即可關閉對抵達之訊息標頭的強制驗證。Use the property to turn off the enforced validation of arriving message headers. 在正常的執行過程中，訊息標頭會與 屬性進行比較，以確認服務已明確地處理抵達的標頭。In normal execution, message headers are compared against the property to confirm that arriving headers are explicitly handled by the service. 將此屬性設定為 `false`，即可停用這項檢查。Set this to `false` to disable this checking. 如果是設定為 `false`，應用程式就必須檢查標示為 MustUnderstand="true" 的標頭，並在無法瞭解其中一或多個標頭時傳回錯誤。When set to `false`, the application must check for headers marked with MustUnderstand="true" and return a fault if one or more of them were not understood. 當應用程式應該接受任何傳入的 SOAP 訊息 (例如，使用具型別或不具型別的訊息時) 以及執行自訂標頭處理時，這種設定會十分有用。This is useful when the application is supposed to accept any incoming SOAP messages (for example, when using typed or untyped messages) and perform custom header processing.
